Battery Charger Project PC Control

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Ken Sarkies (www.jiggerjuice.net)
Date:
31 March 2010

This describes the program structure and detail for the control application for the Battery Charger Project. The development documentation is supplemented by a user manual and overall design documentation. Refer also to documentation for the firmware and serial bootloader.

The Battery Charger control application provides a GUI interface to the Battery Charger Unit. The unit communicates by a message protocol over a serial interface. This program provides:

  1. configuration of the unit,
  2. acquisition of historical internal status data
